short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight multiple words and search for expressions and patterns on web pages with professional-grade precision.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Highlight multiple words with different colors, get real-time stats, and make complex search queries.

Think of this extension as your personal search wizard for web pages! Using * in your search is like a magic key that can stand for any word. For example, if you search "I * unicorns," you'll find sentences like "I love unicorns" and "I hate unicorns." It's like having a super-smart search that gets the magic behind your words!

Privacy is our priority! 123 Highlighter PRO keeps all your data on your local machine. We don't access or save your queries.
